home_section.fofo_tooltip_title: Fofo means 'Hello' in my native language.
home_section.title: I build things related to the web.
home_section.description:
I am a young student from Niger who is passionate about IT.
Currently, I am preparing a bachelor degree in software engineering at the Faculty of Sciences of Monastir in Tunisia.
I'm also heading a small start-up named TiamTech which provides IT services such as Website & Mobile Applications development and IT consulting.

about_me_section.title: About Me
about_me_section.residing_in_tunisia_and_it_passionated: residing in Tunisia and above all passionate about IT.
about_me_section.currently_studies: I am currently in the third year(final) of a software engineering bachelor at the University of Monastir in Tunisia.
about_me_section.also_the_founder_and_ceo_of: I'm also the founder and CEO of
about_me_section.tiamtech_description: a small start-up based in Niger that provides services such as WEBSITES development, Restful API development, mobile application development, IT consulting, etc...
about_me_section.anest_post: I am also in charge of academic and social affairs for the Monastir section of ANEST (Association of Nigerien Students and Trainees in Tunisia).
